title: MUSA 5080 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Weekly Notes: My learning reflections and key concepts
Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




My name is Johnny Chen. I am the first year student in MCP, concentrating in PPD. I studied architecture as an undergraduate and have some experience with R and Python, but only at a very basic level. I hope to use this course to strengthen my ability to conduct spatial analysis using R.




Email: [cyt1014@upenn.edu]
GitHub: [@cyt1014]
